about_the_game:
After their car breaks down, a group of teens find themselves trapped in the clutches of an ancient evil! They must fight against dark forces and find out the truth before it's too late...

From Rosaceae Games comes a homage to classic survival horror. Battle your way through dangerous enemies in a top down perspective, and put your brain to the test solving puzzles and challenges to progress. All wrapped up in a branching story with multiple choices and endings,

Includes:
-top down shooter gameplay with multiple weapons.
-survival horror elements. Limited resources, confined spaces, and terrifying enemies.
-engaging puzzles and tests of your ingenuity
-branching storyline with multiple choices, and real consequences.
-detailed Pixel art cutscenes to tell a mysterious, and horrifying story

content_descriptors.notes: Contains scenes of explicit violence and gore. Some implied nudity, but never fully shown e.g. a character in the bath, only showing their face.

name: Feed

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600 @ 3.30GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: MP59G (1920x1080@75Hz) S24D330 (1920x1080@60Hz) 2047MB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Should work on most pc's made recently.

short_description: A top-down survival horror, where you must fight your way through a mysterious mansion, surviving it's crazed inhabitants.
